title: Hand with Index Finger and Thumb Crossed
keywords: hand with index finger and thumb crossed
description:
A hand with the index finger and thumb crossed and the rest of the fingers making a fist. Can be used in various contexts to represent the fingers snapping, love, or money.

In this emoji, the index finger and the thumb form a small heart shape. This gesture, used to express love or affection, is known as a finger heart and was popularized in the 2010s by South Korean celebrities, including actors, K-pop stars, and comedians.

The same gesture may be used in the context of money to indicate a luxury or an expensive item, a lack of money, or a request to be paid.
apple_vendor_description: This playful emoji, as seen on Apple devices, features a hand with the index finger and thumb forming a perfect circle. Apple's design imbues it with a vibrant, almost tactile quality through its smooth gradients and realistic lighting, making the gesture appear cheerful and engaging.  The soft rounded edges contribute to its friendly and approachable look, often used to signal good luck, a small amount, or a 'little bit of something' in digital conversations.
